1: Wise words help you stand strong and steady.
2: Authentic service honors life with love, wisdom, and humility.
3: Know the divine source and act kindly toward others.
4: I remember earlier guidance exactly when it matters.
5: Go faithfully to the one who sends you
6: Wise words bring comfort and strengthen the heart.
7: Letting go creates space for a comforting guide.
8: A guiding presence reveals truth, strengthens what is right, and delivers justice.
9: Trusting the true guide brings clarity and wholeness.
10: Alignment with the source establishes righteousness.
11: Justice prevails, and rightful order shapes the world
12: Understanding expands as readiness to receive grows.
13: Truthful guidance leads to all truth and reveals what comes.
14: A faithful guide honors the source and shares its wisdom.
15: The source reveals and shares all things with you.
16: Brief waiting reveals renewed presence and growing joy.
17: A short time brings renewed sight and deeper connection.
18: Ask for clarity and gain understanding.
19: Presence returns shortly, bringing renewed clarity.
20: Every sorrow turns into joy that endures.
21: Joy blossoms with the birth of a child.
22: Unshakable joy fills the heart and endures.
23: I ask the Father in your name and receive.
24: Ask, receive, and joy becomes complete.
25: Plain speech reveals clear understanding of the divine.
26: I ask with aligned intent and enjoy direct connection.
27: God loves those who love and trust the one he sent.
28: I come from the source and go to the source.
29: Clear, plain speech strengthens shared understanding.
30: Complete understanding shows divine source and builds enduring trust.
31: Believe now with clear, steady trust.
32: A constant divine presence stays with each person.
33: Stay cheerful and peaceful; lasting victory prevails over the world.
